ai-patthana18.7:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.7:0.3_0: There are some who are caught up in the midst of the Sangha.
ai-patthana18.7:1.1_0: Because of his thought, the support is not a cause.
ai-patthana18.7:2.1_0: Not because of the support, the basis for the sake of non-confused.
ai-patthana18.7:3.1_0: Not knowing the thought that the mind is not a condition for the sake of thought.
ai-patthana18.7:4.1_0: Because of the thought, not the mind.
ai-patthana18.7:5.1_0: Because of the natural principles don’t arise for the sake of mental phenomena.
ai-patthana18.7:7.1_0: Because of his thoughts, the mind doesn’t arise because of mental processes.
ai-patthana18.7:8.1_0: No cause is a reason for the sake of mind.
ai-patthana18.7:9.1_0: Because of your mind, the reason for not knowing the sake of thought, not seeing the causes and reasons.
ai-patthana18.7:10.1_0: for the sake of decorating mind, mind doesn’t mixture with the mind.
ai-patthana18.7:11.1_0: Because of this the cause, the mind doesn’t cause the reason for the sake of mental processes.
ai-patthana18.7:12.1_0: Not for the sake of investigating, not for the sake of thought that the causes and reasons.
ai-patthana18.7:13.1_0: Because of his mind is not overcome by the corruptions of the mind.
ai-patthana18.7:14.1_0: Not for the sake of their mind, they don’t arise because of the austerity of mind.
ai-patthana18.7:15.1_0: Or they don’t swapped with the thought that gives rise to mind.
ai-patthana18.7:16.1_0: Not knowing the cause, the reason for the sake of purification of mind, they don’t give rise to the underlying tendency to repulsion.
ai-patthana18.7:17.1_0: Because of this reason for the sake of investigating, not for the sake of thought.
ai-patthana18.7:18.1_0: Not for the sake of purification of mind. No for the sake of purification of mind. There is a reason for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana18.7:19.1_0: There is a cause of the mind that leads to the sake of deceiving mind. But because of the corruption of mental processes, not for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana18.7:20.1_0: Not because of the mind, the mental processes—that is not the cause or reason why the mind is not a reason for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana18.7:21.1_0: Because of your mind, the mental discrimination don’t arise by change, not taking care of the mind.
ai-patthana18.7:22.1_0: Not for the sake of their minds.
ai-patthana18.7:22.1_4: He should not give formal support.
